page.title: 12Footpaths at Castle Camps
page.content: Most of the footpaths are used in Castle Camps. The famous one is the church path. My mum use to go up the church path when she was small.There are several footpaths in Castle Camps though I dont know how many.Nearly every Sunday we go up to the church path. Some of the foot paths are short and ploughed up.The footpaths are used every day,or nearly every day.Some of the foot paths go from Castle Camps and right down to Shudy Camps.Some of the footpaths have seats to stop at. Two years ago, a teacher used to run a Footpath Club, during which we walked paths to help keep them open. Farmers plough very near the edges sometimes. by Kai.
